definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
ton-kilometer (unit of capacity of transport system)

sentences.english: The plant is at a distance of 12km to Dabaodang Town . with convenient traffic and excellent surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 該廠距大保當鎮12公里，交通便利，環境優美。

sentences.english: Yongbyon is approximately 60 miles [96 kilometers] north of the capital at Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 寧邊位於北韓首都平壤以北約96公里處。

sentences.english: At sur-rhone, north Durance River and the confluence rhone 4 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 在羅訥河畔，南距迪朗斯河和羅訥河匯合處4公里。

sentences.english: From the Chilean capital of Santiago, the epicenter about 590 km.
sentences.chinese: 震中距智利首都聖地亞哥市約590公里。

sentences.english: Riverside Hotel at Sea Island in the southern part of Davao, from the international airport two kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 海島水邊飯店位於達沃的南部，離國際機場2公里。

sentences.english: Photo taken at Buddha Park, also known as Wat Xieng Khuan 25 km southeast from Vientiane.
sentences.chinese: 在佛公園攝，也寺昆萬象25公里東南衆所周知的。

sentences.english: Range is about 35km but altitude is good.
sentences.chinese: 它的射程只有35公里，但是射高很好。

sentences.english: The year before, 2, 295 square kilometers (1, 426 square miles) were destroyed over that time period.
sentences.chinese: 在上一個年度，有2295平方公里的森林被毀。

sentences.english: The downhill course measured 200m and competitors reached speeds of up to 25km per hour, the organizer said.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 組織者說，參賽選手的最高時速達到了25公里。

sentences.english: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
sentences.chinese: 據我估計我們離梅卡巴堡有七八公里遠。

sentences.english: Xiangzhong Yang was born on a farming collective about 300 miles south of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 楊向中出生在北京南部300公里的農村。

sentences.english: The shipyard is within 5km of shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 這個船廠離上海5公里以內。

sentences.english: Another 4 kilometers, we reached the center of Mannheim.
sentences.chinese: 再走4公里，我們到達了曼海姆的中心。

sentences.english: We walked for miles along the endless beach.
sentences.chinese: 我們沿着那綿遠的海灘行走了數公里。

sentences.english: Although China and Saudi is thousands of kilometers away, the people in both countries have intercourse since long ago.
sentences.chinese: 中國和沙特雖相距數千公里，但兩國人民早有來往。

sentences.english: Bingling Si Grotoes are 129 km southwest of Lanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 炳靈寺石窟在蘭州城西南129公里處。

definition: travel time/expected time for a car journey
at a distance of/distance/to be apart
ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
